entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Temperature: -6.7°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 88 %

Dewpoint: -8.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
